convert_to_image.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python2.7
2 import rospy
3 from humanoid_league_msgs.msg import ImageWithRegionOfInterest
4 from geometry_msgs.msg import Point
5 from sensor_msgs.msg import Image
6 import numpy as np
7 from cv_bridge import CvBridge
8 import cv2
9 
10 
11 class Converter(object):
12  def __init__(self):
13  rospy.init_node("image_converter")
14 
15  rospy.Subscriber(rospy.get_param("fcnn_image_topic", "fcnn_image"),
16  ImageWithRegionOfInterest,
17  self._callback_fcnn,
18  queue_size=1,
19  tcp_nodelay=True,
20  buff_size=60000000)
21  # https://github.com/ros/ros_comm/issues/536
22 
23  self.initial_image_size = (640, 360)
24 
25  self.image_pub = rospy.Publisher('converted_image', Image, queue_size=1)
26 
27  self.bridge = CvBridge()
28 
29  rospy.spin()
30 
31  def _callback_fcnn(self, msg):
32  input_image = self.bridge.imgmsg_to_cv2(msg.image, 'bgr8') # TODO: evaluate this!!!
33  rospy.logdebug(input_image.shape)
34  rospy.logdebug((int(msg.regionOfInterest.width) + 1, int(msg.regionOfInterest.height) + 1))
35  input_image = cv2.resize(input_image, (int(msg.regionOfInterest.width) + 1, int(msg.regionOfInterest.height) + 1))
36 
37  output_image = np.zeros((self.initial_image_size[1], self.initial_image_size[0], 3), dtype=np.uint8)
38  output_image[:,:,0] = 180 # everything is dark blue
39  output_image[int(msg.regionOfInterest.y_offset):int(msg.regionOfInterest.y_offset + msg.regionOfInterest.height) + 1, int(msg.regionOfInterest.x_offset):int(msg.regionOfInterest.x_offset + msg.regionOfInterest.width) + 1] = input_image # copying the image into the empty frame
40 
41  self.image_pub.publish(self.bridge.cv2_to_imgmsg(output_image, 'bgr8'))
42 
43 if __name__ == "__main__":
44  Converter()
